amendment.description: An amendment numbered 89 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit any funds being used to designate the Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness as a national monument under the Antiquities Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
